column1: Little Goat Diner////This is undeniably one of my favorite restaurants in the city
column2: especially when I'm looking for comfort food. The goat almighty burger is amazing and the corned beef kimchee rueben is one of my favs. The chili cheese fries are a meal in themselves and the pork belly pancakes (not actual pancakes) are awesome. I've been for brunch and dinner and have never been disappointed.
